attr.title: CMDungeon
attr.desc: CMDungeon is a platform puzzle game where you need to "cheat" to win, using the terminals around the rooms planning your strategy based on your keys. Developed by Lucas "Cuca" Coelho.
attr.inst: Go to the game's itch site at https://cuca.itch.io/cmdungeon and download the cmdungeonv0.2.0_linux_x11.zip and place it into port folder.
